price: គ្មានការសង្ស័យឡើយថា ពួកគេពិតជាពួកដែលខាតបង់ បំផុតនៅថ្ងៃបរលោក។
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
